title: How Many Calories in Mustard?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in mustard per tablespoon, including carbs, sodium, fat details, and variations like Dijon or honey mustard.
assumptions: Prepared yellow mustard; standard condiment serving (15 g per tbsp); no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (yellow, Dijon, whole grain), brand, and preparation; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of yellow mustard has about 5 calories and is low in fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of mustard?
faqs.a: About 5 calories per tablespoon of yellow mustard.
Yes, only 0.5 g carbs per tbsp, with 0.3 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in mustard?
faqs.a: Around 160 mg per tablespoon, mostly from salt.

faqs.q: Calories in Dijon vs. yellow mustard?
faqs.a: Dijon has about 10-15 kcal per tbsp, slightly more than yellow's 5 kcal.

faqs.q: Does mustard have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.3 g fat per tbsp and 0 mg cholesterol.
